resources.string: In this app you can also check for the installed app permissions just to be sure if anything suspicious happens. To make the experience easier the apps are grouped in 3 categories, user installed, google and system apps. Unfortunately you can not uninstall google or system apps but you can disable them by clicking to the app settings button and proceeding in the settings.
Also you can share it in-app or by going to the extraction folder which is named APPK in your files and find the apk there.
APPK is an Apk extractor app that means you can share and save your apps (not saved data) in a Apk (Android application package) form.
